Package model

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
model.Ship
All Implemented Interfaces:
TypeOfShip
Direct Known Subclasses:
Battleship, Carrier, Cruiser, Destroyer, ResettedGrid, Submarine
public class Ship extends Object implements TypeOfShip
The ship class is used to represent a ship in the Battleship game. This ship class holds information of the ship's data. Size is the number of squares the ship occupies.
Author:
kelvin.likollari@usi.ch

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship(int size, int positionX, int positionY, boolean isshot, boolean issunk, boolean isHidden, boolean isHit)
      Constructor for the ship class.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the ship. The size of the ship is the number of squares the ship occupies.
      positionX - The x position of the ship. The x position of the ship is the x coordinate of the ship's first square.
      positionY - The y position of the ship. The y position of the ship is the y coordinate of the ship's first square.
      isshot - Whether the ship is shot or not.
      issunk - Whether the ship is sunk or not.
      isHidden - Whether the ship is hidden or not.
      isHit - Whether the ship is hit or not.

    • Ship

      public Ship(int positionX, int positionY, int len)
      Constructor of the Ship class.
      Parameters:
      positionX - int that represents the position on the X axis.
      positionY - int that represents the position on the Y axis.
      len - int that represents the length of the ship.
